install.name: Community - Activity Comments
install.author: Socialcode
install.description: Allows site members to comment on activities

param.name: respect_privacy
param.label: Respect user privacy
param.description: When enabled, only friends can like or comment on their activity

param.name: updatestatus
param.label: Auto Update Status
param.description: When enabled, the message here will be automatically updated as your profile status

param.name: enablesubscribe
param.label: Enable Subscribe
param.description: When enabled, subscribe will appear in the activity stream which allows user to subscribe on a users activity like and comments without participating.

param.name: enablerepost
param.label: Enable Reposting
param.description: When enabled, Repost will appear in the activity stream which allows user to Repost a particular activity.

param.name: uselikeicon
param.label: Like icon
param.description: Enable or disable like icon

param.name: usecommenticon
param.label: Comment icon
param.description: Enable or disable comment icon

param.name: usesubscribeicon
param.label: Subscribe icon
param.description: Enable or disable subscribe icon

param.name: usereposticon
param.label: Repost icon
param.description: Enable or disable repost icon

param.name: notifylike
param.label: Notify likes via email
param.description: Enable or disable author email notifications when a user likes an item. When enabled, author of the activity will receive an email.

param.name: notifycomment
param.label: Notify comments via email
param.description: Enable or disable author email notifications when a user comments an item. When enabled, author of the activity will receive an email.

param.name: commentordering
param.label: Ordering of comments
param.description: Set the ordering of comments from either newest first or oldest first.

param.name: commentlimit
param.label: Limit comments
param.description: Limit number of comments to be displayed. Any other comments will be displayed using the more link. To disable this option, set 0

param.name: autoclose
param.label: Automatically close textarea
param.description: Automatically close textarea once a comment is submitted.

param.name: photopreview
param.label: Enable photo preview in shared links
param.description: Enable or disable photo preview when a user shares a link.

param.name: joingroup
param.label: Enable join group link in activities
param.description: Enable or disable join group links in activity content.

param.name: addfriend
param.label: Enable or disable add friend
param.description: Enable or disable add friend links in activity content.

param.name: sharemessage
param.label: Allow user to share message in sharing box
param.description: Enable or disable message sharing in sharing area.

param.name: sharephoto
param.label: Allow user to share photos in sharing box
param.description: Enable or disable photo sharing in sharing area.

param.name: shareurl
param.label: Allow user to share url in sharing box
param.description: Enable or disable url sharing in sharing area.

param.name: shareurltarget
param.label: Select action when user clicks a shared link
param.description: Set to have shared links open in new page or current page.

param.name: sharefrontpage
param.label: Status sharing on JomSocial frontpage
param.description: Enable or disable sharing box in JomSocial front page.

param.name: shareprofile
param.label: Status sharing on Profile page
param.description: Enable or disable sharing box in users profile page
